script.name: al.GNS.DNGenerator.Tick
script.description: Pirate Guild - AL Plugin - Main Timer Routine

line.comment: * al.GNS.DNGenerator.Tick
* This is the AL timer script that generates the Dynamic News articles.
* Most of the logic in this script is just concerned with generating a random variety
* of news articles, so you can see how different news settings appear in
* the game.
* The magic happens on line 114: this calls the plugin.GNS.Add.Article script to insert your
* new article into the News Service.
* Mutex flag just ensures this AL loop never tries to run while a previous
* loop is still running.
* Not a significant concern with this plugin, but if a plugin is heavy enough,
* and the timer interval is too short, you could end up with two loops
* simultaneous.
* Load our probabilities and other needed data from the T-file
* Default: Publish news in all sectors
* Not publishing in all sectors, select specific sectors or races
* Publish in current Player sector
* Publish for random selection of races
* No races selected, just publish in current Player sector
* Check whether article is to be displayed once
* Check whether action button is to be added to article

line.text: 'The action button is being used in this article.'

line.comment: * We need a unique id for this article. The GNS plugin provides a utility that gives you one.
* Hopefully, we don't end up with multiple plugins asking for an ID at the same time and
* receiving the ID. May have to adjust the GNS.GetID script to avoid that. Probably low risk now.
* Format article text

line.text: 'ONCE only. When an article is set to be displayed ONCE, it will be available for viewing until the News Service window is closed'

line.comment: * And submit our formatted article to the News Service
* Lower loop running flag
* ** DEBUG ***
* ** DEBUG ***

sval.val: Pirate Guild - AL Plugin - Main Timer Routine
The action button is being used in this article.
ONCE only. When an article is set to be displayed ONCE, it will be available for viewing until the News Service window is closed
until
in all sectors
for %s race(s)
%s : %s
in %s only
Button.Script: %s
This is the AL timer script that generates the Dynamic News articles.
Most of the logic in this script is just concerned with generating a random variety
of news articles, so you can see how different news settings appear in
the game.
The magic happens on line 114: this calls the plugin.GNS.Add.Article script to insert your
new article into the News Service.
Mutex flag just ensures this AL loop never tries to run while a previous
loop is still running.
Not a significant concern with this plugin, but if a plugin is heavy enough,
and the timer interval is too short, you could end up with two loops
Load our probabilities and other needed data from the T-file
Default: Publish news in all sectors
Not publishing in all sectors, select specific sectors or races
Publish in current Player sector
Publish for random selection of races
No races selected, just publish in current Player sector
Check whether article is to be displayed once
Check whether action button is to be added to article
We need a unique id for this article. The GNS plugin provides a utility that gives you one.
Hopefully, we don't end up with multiple plugins asking for an ID at the same time and
receiving the ID. May have to adjust the GNS.GetID script to avoid that. Probably low risk now.
Format article text
And submit our formatted article to the News Service
